alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson; Lumpkin; White (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Barrow, southeastern Lumpkin, northeastern Gwinnett, western Banks, southern White, Hall and Jackson Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cornelia to near Apple Valley, and moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Winder, Jefferson, Commerce, Cleveland, Homer, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Oakwood, Lula, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Clermont, Pendergrass, Carl and Gillsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Banks; Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson; Lumpkin; White
